yle="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">/&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">src</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">https://resources.developer.clockify.me/ui/latest/js/main.min.js</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">src</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/date-fns@4.1.0/cdn.min.js</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>

<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Define UI elements</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that we’ve imported the UI kit, our next step is to create a body tag and then define our UI elements.</p>
<div class="language-html"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-html" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>           </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Retrieving and decoding the authentication token</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Our next goal will be to retrieve our time entries data through Clockify’s API and present a simple overview of the total time tracked.
The first thing that we need to do is to create a script section at the end of our file.</p>
<div class="language-html"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-html" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token script language-javascript">
</span></span><span class="token script language-javascript" style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>    
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span class="token script language-javascript"></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Next, we’ll retrieve the authentication token that Clockify provides to our <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">component</a> and use that token to make a call to the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://docs.developer.clockify.me/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">Clockify API</a>.</p>
<div class="language-javascript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-javascript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> token </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">URLSearchParams</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>window</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>location</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>search</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'auth_token'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Clockify’s add-ons can be installed on a wide range of environments, be it on a regional instance or even on development test workspaces.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To ensure that add-ons can work independent of the environment where they are installed, we have to retrieve all the environment-related information from the authentication token - which is in fact a <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://jwt.io/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">JWT</a>.
You can learn more about the claims present in the JWT token on the following <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/learn/introduction.html#how-does-clockify-interact-with-add-on-through-ui">link</a>.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For our component, we’re mostly interested in the following three claims:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">backendUrl - the URL of the backend (environment) where our API calls will be made</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">workspaceId - the ID of the workspace where our add-on was installed</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">user - the ID of the user that is currently viewing our component</li>
</ul>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">It should be noted that each authentication token that is supplied to the iframe only references a specific add-on install on a single workspace.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This example will bypass the verification step and only retrieve the claims from the token, but it’s <em><strong class="font-semibold">strongly</strong></em> recommended that production add-ons perform the proper validations before accepting the token as valid.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The JWT is signed with RSA256. The public key used to verify the token can be accessed on the following <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">link</a>.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="language-javascript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-javascript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// note: JWT tokens and their respective claims should always be verified before being accepted</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> tokenPayload </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-constant);">JSON</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">parse</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">atob</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>token</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">split</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'.'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> backendUrl </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> tokenPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'backendUrl'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> workspaceId </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> tokenPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'workspaceId'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> userId </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> tokenPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'user'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Interacting with the API</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now, it’s time to make the API call.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">While Clockify provides endpoints for generating reports, to keep it simple we’re going to call the time entries endpoint which can be found <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://docs.developer.clockify.me/#tag/Time-entry/operation/getTimeEntries" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">here</a>.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Note that we're using the values we retrieved from the claims to construct the endpoint we're calling.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="language-javascript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-javascript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> oneWeekAgo </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">subWeeks</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">Date</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">fetch</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">${</span><span class="token template-string interpolation">backendUrl</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">/v1/workspaces/</span><span template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">/time-entries?</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">+</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">URLSearchParams</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">'page-size'</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">500</span><span class="token" style="color: class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">toString</span><span class="token" style="color: </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>            </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">headers</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"x-addon-token"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> token</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">method</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"GET"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">then</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token parameter">response</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>status </span><span class="token operator">!==</span><span> </span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>            console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Received status "</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">+</span><span> response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>status</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">return</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span>        
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">let</span><span> totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>        response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">json</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">forEach</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token parameter">entry</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> start </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> entry</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"timeInterval"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"start"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> end </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> entry</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"timeInterval"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"end"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> durationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">differenceInSeconds</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">parseISO</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>end</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">parseISO</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>start</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>            totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">+=</span><span> durationSeconds</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> element </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> document</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getElementById</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"tracked-time"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">!==</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> duration </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">intervalToDuration</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">start</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">end</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">*</span><span> </span><span class="token number">1000</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>            element</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>textContent </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">formatDuration</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>duration</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">else</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span><span>            element</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>textContent </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"no time tracked"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">28</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">29</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">catch</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token parameter">e</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Could not retrieve time entries"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">30</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In the above snippet, we call the Clockify API and retrieve a list of time entries for our user.
Then, we iterate through the entries and sum up all the durations which will then be used to display the total duration in a human friendly way.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You will notice we supplied a header named <code>x-addon-token</code>. The token used to make this API call is the same token that was supplied at the moment our component was served.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This token has access only over the user that is currently viewing our UI component inside the Clockify iframe, and unlike the token that is supplied during the add-on install expires in 30 minutes.</p>
<h2 id="serving-our-add-on" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Serving our add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#serving-our-add-on">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that our UI is ready, we need to go back to our Java class and set up the webserver for our add-on.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The Addon SDK provides an embedded web server which we can use to quickly set up and serve our manifest and the UI.</p>
<div class="language-java"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-java" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> addon </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">ClockifyAddon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>manifest</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">registerComponent</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>uiComponent</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">-&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> classLoader </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">Thread</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">currentThread</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getContextClassLoader</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> inputStream </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> classLoader</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getResourceAsStream</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"sidebar-component.html"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    inputStream</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">transferTo</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getOutputStream</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">setStatus</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">HttpServletResponse</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>SC_OK</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> servlet </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">AddonServlet</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> server </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">EmbeddedServer</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>servlet</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>server</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">start</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token number">8080</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The manifest will be automatically served under the <code>/manifest</code> path, while for the UI we will register a handler which will load the HTML file from the resources and serve it to the response.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The UI component will be served under the path that was previously configured.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Our add-on is ready to be run, simply run the <code>main()</code> method and access the add-on manifest on <code>{baseUrl}/manifest</code> to install it on your development workspace.</p>
<h2 id="testing-our-add-on" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Testing our add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#testing-our-add-on">#</a></h2>
<h3 id="developer-account-1" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Developer account<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#developer-account-1">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that we've got our add-on up and running we are ready to continue with the next step - trying out the add-on on the Clockify developer environment.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In order to do so, we first need to create a <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/developer-account.html">developer account</a>.</p>
<h3 id="testing-environment" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Testing environment<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#testing-environment">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Once the account is set up, the next step is to access the testing environment for our account.
The testing environment is a pre-populated environment where you can test how your add-on would work in a real Clockify workspace.
Testing environments are unique to each developer account, and the created workspaces have access to all Clockify features.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To access the testing environment, follow these steps:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Log in to your <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developer.marketplace.cake.com/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">developer account</a></li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Navigate to the <em><strong class="font-semibold">Test accounts</strong></em> section and log in as one of the pre-made users</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">You’ll be redirected to the Clockify test environment</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">From there, go to <em><strong class="font-semibold">Workspace settings</strong></em></li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Select the <em><strong class="font-semibold">Add-ons</strong></em> tab (visible only to users with the administrator role)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Insert the link to your add-on manifest and click <code>Install</code></li>
</ol>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">A toast message will appear indicating a successful installation.
All the installed add-ons will be listed on this page.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Multiple add-ons can be installed on testing environments as long as the manifest keys are unique among them.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/marketplace-testing-env.5ecfabd0.png" alt="Testing Environment Add-ons" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The following info will be displayed on this page:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Icon (if available, if not – default image)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Name (from manifest)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Status (enabled/disabled)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Short description (from manifest)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">More options (listed if there are any)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Settings (Optional and defined in manifest. If they exist, you can click on the Settings, and the Add-on settings page will open.)</li>
</ul>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>There are two types of settings:

Clockify settings – saved on our server and specified in manifest
Settings – add-on settings that can be done by developers and displayed as an iFrame on this page)
</code></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Enable/disable (Installed add-on is automatically enabled)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Webhooks (opens a modal regarding add-on webhooks)
Modal that opens displays webhooks that are sent from Clockify to this add-on.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Uninstall (disabled add-on and removes it from the list)</li>
</ul>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To maintain a secure environment and prevent potential misuse, your data will be automatically cleared every month.</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="providing-a-public-url" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Providing a public URL<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#providing-a-public-url">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To be able to install our add-on, we first need to provide a public URL.
We can do so by using a reverse proxy service such as <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://ngrok.com/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">ngrok</a>.
Let's create a free account at <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://ngrok.com/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">ngrok</a> and follow their guidelines for installing &amp; running app <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://ngrok.com/docs/getting-started/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">docs</a>.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After you’ve setup ngrok, run the following command:</p>
<div class="language-shell"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-shell" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>ngrok http 8080</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This will generate tunnel to your app running on port 8080.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/ngrok.46656db7.png" alt="Ngrok CLI" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Note the public URL in the output:</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://7ba8-188-246-34-133.eu.ngrok.io" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">https://7ba8-188-246-34-133.eu.ngrok.io</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We can now go back to our add-on's code and provide this public URL as the base URL for our manifest.</p>
<h3 id="installing-our-add-on" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Installing our add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#installing-our-add-on">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Once we've opened the add-ons tab on our workspace, we are ready to install our add-on.
With the add-on webserver running and our public URL configured, we'll paste in the link to our manifest <code>{base URL}/manifest</code> and click on install.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We can now see that our add-on has been successfully installed.
It will show up on the sidebar like in the screenshot below:</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/add-on-sidebar.5ada55ce.png" alt="Sidebar Add-on" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We can now click on our sidebar entry to access our add-on's UI.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You may notice that our sidebar entry is using a default icon. You can specify a custom icon by setting the iconPath property on the UI component.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/add-on-ui.201c349f.png" alt="UI Add-on" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You may observe the UI component has been loaded inside an iframe. UI components are always loaded inside iframes, irrespective of their location.</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="next-steps" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Next steps<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#next-steps">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We've prepared a <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/development-checklist.html">Development Checklist</a> which will help you ensure that you've taken care of all the important aspects of the add-on development flow.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After you've gone through our development checklist, you are ready to check out our add-on <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html">publishing section</a> for a detailed overview of the add-on publishing flow.</p></div><div class="rspress-doc-footer"><footer class="mt-8"><div class="xs:flex pb-5 px-2 justify-end items-center"></div><div class="flex flex-col"></div><div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:justify-around gap-4 pt-6"><div class="prev_e7091 flex flex-col"><a 1s-.4 1-1 1zM4.2 20.8c-.3 0-.5-.1-.7-.3-.4-.4-.4-1 0-1.4l1.4-1.4c.4-.4 1-.4 1.4 0s.4 1 0 1.4l-1.4 1.4c-.2.2-.4.3-.7.3zM18.4 6.6c-.3 0-.5-.1-.7-.3-.4-.4-.4-1 0-1.4l1.4-1.4c.4-.4 1-.4 1.4 0s.4 1 0
