</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>      name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Open modal'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">43</span><span>                        value</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">test metadata</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">44</span><span>                        text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">45</span><span>                           text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Read info'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">46</span><span>                           type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"plain_text"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">47</span><span>                        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">48</span><span>                        style</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"danger"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">49</span><span>                     </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">50</span><span>                  </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">51</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">52</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">53</span><span>         </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">54</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">55</span><span>   </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">56</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Don't call <code>ctx.ack()</code> in case you're handling modals (opening, updating or pushing new modals).</p>
</div></div>
<h5 id="handle-submission" class="title_3b154">Handle submission<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#handle-submission">#</a></h5>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>viewAction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    onSubmit</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// block needs to be wrapped with block of type = "input" in order to be available in a view state</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// in our case only static_select_menu_input_action (that's inside input_static_1) is available</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" Do whatever with it :)</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>    onClose</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// will be triggered only if notifyOnClose=true</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>      </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">modal_callback_id_1</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Modal closed"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>  </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For input values to be included in a view <code>state</code>, they must be wrapped within an <code>input</code> block. Furthermore, the <code>modal_callback_id_1</code> handler name must correspond to the value specified in the modal's <code>callbackId</code> property.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive tip"><div class="rspress-directive-title">TIP</div><div class="rspress-directive-content">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You can also receive block interaction events for modal inputs by setting <code>dispatchAction</code> to <code>true</code> in input block.</p>
</div></div>
<h5 id="handle-block-interactions" class="title_3b154">Handle block interactions<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#handle-block-interactions">#</a></h5>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>blockInteraction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>   interactions</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>         sourceType</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"MESSAGE"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>         handlers</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">bttn_1_action</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Button 1 pressed"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"ephemeral"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>         </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>         sourceType</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'VIEW'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>         handlers</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">static_select_menu_input_action</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Static select from input in modal triggered, do something :)"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">info_btn_action</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// no need to call ctx.ack when pushing new modal</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">pushModalView</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>                   </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> parentViewId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>payload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>sourceId</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">...</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>               </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span><span>         </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span><span>      </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive note"><div class="rspress-directive-title">NOTE</div><div class="rspress-directive-content">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">When pushing a new modal over an existing one, you must specify <code>parentViewId</code>, which represents the parent modal's <code>id</code>.</p>
</div></div>
<h4 id="take-a-look-at-detailed-code-examples-bulb-interactivity-example" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154">Take a look at detailed code examples :bulb: <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/CAKE-com/pumble-node-sdk/tree/master/examples/interactivity" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">interactivity-example</a>.<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#take-a-look-at-detailed-code-examples-bulb-interactivity-example">#</a></h4>
<h2 id="home-views" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Home views<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#home-views">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The Home tab (in app channel), is a private, customizable one-to-one space between a user and an app. It acts as a persistent dashboard where your app can display dynamic, personalized content and provide entry points for core functionality using blocks.</p>
<h5 id="publish-home-view" class="title_3b154">Publish home view<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#publish-home-view">#</a></h5>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The Home view can be updated at any time an app deems appropriate, for instance, three seconds after a user authorizes the app:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>redirect</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    enable</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> path</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"/redirect"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">onSuccess</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>result</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> req</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> res</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>result</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>botToken </span><span class="token operator">&amp;&amp;</span><span> result</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>botId </span><span class="token operator">&amp;&amp;</span><span> result</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>userId</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">setTimeout</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">try</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> addonManifest </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> addonManifestPromise</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> botClient </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> addonManifest</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getBotClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>result</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>workspaceId</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// publish addon home view when user authorizes</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                    botClient</span><span class="token operator">?.</span><span>v1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>app</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">publishHomeView</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>result</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>userId</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>callbackId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">''</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> title</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span class="token operator">...</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">...</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">catch</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>err</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">error</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>err</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token number">3000</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>

rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="terms" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Terms<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#terms">#</a></h1>
<h3 id="cakecom-developer-terms" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">CAKE.com Developer Terms<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#cakecom-developer-terms">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">Last Updated</strong></em>: 08/09/2023</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">These CAKE.com Developer Terms (the “<em><strong class="font-semibold">Terms</strong></em>”) are a binding agreement between CAKE.com Inc. (“<em><strong class="font-semibold">CAKE.com</strong></em>”, “<em><strong class="font-semibold">we</strong></em>” or “<em><strong class="font-semibold">us</strong></em>”) and the individual or entity registering for a Developer Account (“<em><strong class="font-semibold">Developer</strong></em>” or “<em><strong class="font-semibold">you</strong></em>”).</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">By checking the box (or similar action) to accept these Terms or registering for a Developer Account, you agree to be bound by these Terms.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">By registering for a Developer Account, you affirm that you are of legal age to enter into these Terms.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">If you are an individual registering for a Developer Account on behalf of, or for the benefit of, any corporation, partnership or other entity with which you are associated (an “Organization”), then you are agreeing to these Terms on behalf of yourself and such Organization, and you represent and warrant that you have the legal authority to bind such Organization to these Terms. References to “you” and “your” in these Terms will refer to both the individual registering as a developer and to any such Organization.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We may change these Terms from time to time by notifying you of such changes by any reasonable means, including by posting revised Terms through our website. Any such changes will not apply to any dispute between you and us arising prior to the date on which we posted the revised Terms incorporating such changes, or otherwise notified you of such changes. Your continued use of your Developer Account following any changes to these Terms will constitute your acceptance of such changes. The “Last Updated” legend above indicates when these Terms were last changed.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">1. Introduction to the CAKE.com Tools.</strong></em> By registering for a Developer Account on the CAKE.com Marketplace, CAKE.com makes available to you certain CAKE.com Tools and grants you access to its Developer Portal to help you develop and use Add-Ons in connection with the Services. These Terms apply to all developers with a Developer Account, whether you are an end user of Add-Ons or a third party who provides your Add-Ons to end users. If you wish to list your Add-On on the CAKE.com Marketplace, you must enter into the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/cake-com-marketplace-listing-agreement.html">CAKE.com Marketplace Listing Agreement</a>.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2. Key Definitions</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.1. “Add-On(s)”</strong></em> means third-party programs, applications, enhancements, products and/or services developed by Developer and offered by Developer through the CAKE.com Marketplace that are compatible and intended to be used with a Service through an API connection. “Add-On” also includes any New Version of an existing Add-On.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.2. “Add-On User”</strong></em> means a CAKE.com Enterprise User that accepts, purchases or uses an Add-On, which is subject to a separate Add-On User Terms with Developer.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.3. “Add-On User Privacy Policy”</strong></em> means a legally adequate and compliant privacy policy provided to each Add-On User from whom you or your Add-On collects, accesses or otherwise processes Add-On User Data.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.4. “Add-On User Terms”</strong></em> means a legally adequate and compliant agreement governing Add-On Users’ use of your Add-Ons.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.5. “Applicable Laws”</strong></em> means all applicable laws, rules, regulations or orders, including those relating to data privacy, data transfer, international communications or the export of technical or personal data.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.6. “Applicable Policies”</strong></em> means all policies and guidelines made available to developers by CAKE.com via the Developer Portal, including the Marketplace Guidelines.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.7. “CAKE.com Enterprise User”</strong></em> or “Enterprise User” means the commercial entity, including its business and authorized users, that are licensed and authorized to use the Services pursuant to applicable terms of use.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.8. “CAKE.com Marketplace”</strong></em> means marketplace.cake.com or any other webpage, application, interface, service or in-product experience at which CAKE.com makes available or lists Add-Ons and any other location that allows for the discovery, download or purchase of Add-Ons.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.9. “CAKE.com Marks”</strong></em> means the trademarks, trade names, service marks and logos owned or otherwise used by CAKE.com. Nothing contained herein shall grant you any ownership right in the CAKE.com Marks or any other CAKE.com intellectual property.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.10. “CAKE.com Tools”</strong></em> means the APIs, API keys, code, access tokens, SDKs, testing environments for certain Services and other tools CAKE.com makes available to Developers.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.11. “Content”</strong></em> means all Add-Ons and Product Information delivered by Developer to CAKE.com on or prior to the initial availability date the developer designates for the Add-On (the “Initial Availability Date”).</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.12. “Developer Account”</strong></em> means the account through which you participate in the CAKE.com Marketplace, offer and manage Add-Ons, engage with the Developer Portal and receive payment from CAKE.com for your Add-Ons.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.13. “Developer Portal”</strong></em> means the online platform made accessible to Developer by CAKE.com, available at <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developer.marketplace.cake.com" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">developer.marketplace.cake.com</a>, on which CAKE.com from time to time will communicate program details and changes and provide sales tools and services, to Developer.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.14. “Marketplace Guidelines”</strong></em> means the terms, rules and policies that CAKE.com makes available at <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://dev-docs.marketplace.cake.com" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">dev-docs.marketplace.cake.com</a>, which set forth certain requirements (as may be modified by CAKE.com from time to time) for offering your Add-Ons in the CAKE.com Marketplace.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.15. “New Versions”</strong></em> means any enhancements, upgrades, updates, bug fixes, patches, new versions and other modifications and amendments to your Add-Ons.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.16. “Process”</strong></em>, <em><strong class="font-semibold">“Processing”</strong></em>, and/or <em><strong class="font-semibold">“Processed”</strong></em> means any operation or set of operations that are performed on personal information or on sets of personal information, whether or not by automated means.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.17. “Product Information”</strong></em> means the following information and materials: (a) Add-On title, category, Developer name, List Prices (if applicable), product description, icon, logo or banner images, security and privacy information and any other information related to the Add-Ons that CAKE.com requires; (b) the metadata, graphics, artwork, images, trademarks, trade names, logos and other descriptive or identifying information and materials associated with you or a particular Add-On that you wish to appear in connection with your Add-On; and (c) your Add-On User Terms and Add-On User Privacy Policy.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.18. “Security Incident”</strong></em> means any actual or suspected (a) unauthorized access, acquisition, use, disclosure, modification, loss or destruction of Add-On User Data in the possession or control of you or your agents or contractors (whether intentional or accidental), (b) security vulnerability or compromise of your Add-On or (c) issue involving your Add-On that materially degrades CAKE.com systems or networks.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">2.19. “Services”</strong></em> means websites, mobile applications, desktop apps and widgets, tools and other online products and services that are owned and operated by CAKE.com, including (without limitation) the products and services currently known as Clockify, Plaky, and Pumble.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">3. Using the CAKE.com Tools.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">3.1. Registration.</strong></em> To use the CAKE.com Tools, you must register for a Developer Account in the CAKE.com Marketplace. All access keys or developer credentials provided to you to access the CAKE.com Tools are CAKE.com’s Confidential Information and you may not share or permit others to use these account credentials. You are responsible for providing accurate Developer Account information. If any Developer Account information is inaccurate or needs to be updated or modified, you will promptly provide CAKE.com with corrections, updates or modifications. You must use a strong password for your account that is unique to our Developer Portal and not used by you in any other website or online service. You must maintain the security of your account, as applicable, and promptly notify us if you discover or suspect that someone has accessed your account without your permission. We reserve the right to reject, require that you change, or reclaim usernames, including on behalf of businesses or individuals that hold legal title, including trademark rights, in those usernames.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">3.2. Developer Portal.</strong></em> During the Term, Developer may access the Developer Portal, which includes access to certain CAKE.com Tools, CAKE.com Marks, marketing tools, and Applicable Policies. Developers may use such resources solely to exercise its rights and fulfill their obligations under these Terms. To access the Developer Portal, a Developer may be required to activate or validate its status as a Developer through its Developer Account and create a username and secure password, as further specified on the Developer Portal landing page.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">3.3. Review.</strong></em> You and your Add-Ons must comply with these Terms and all Applicable Policies. CAKE.com reserves the right to review your compliance with the Applicable Policies and our security, performance and other criteria. At CAKE.com’s request, you will comply with our review process and provide us with reasonably requested information, including (if applicable) test accounts for your Add-Ons, which we will only use for purposes of such review. CAKE.com may change its review processes at any time.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">3.4. Updates and Support.</strong></em> CAKE.com may, but is under no obligation to, maintain, support, update or provide error corrections for the CAKE.com Tools. If CAKE.com provides you with an update or maintenance release for the CAKE.com Tools, unless you receive a separate license from CAKE.com for that update or release that expressly supersedes these Terms, such update or release will be subject to the terms and conditions of these Terms. Each Add-On must maintain absolute compatibility with the CAKE.com Tools to be granted access to the CAKE.com Tools and the Services, including by (a) applying all CAKE.com Tools and Services updates provided by CAKE.com, (b) providing all functionalities identified as critical by CAKE.com and (c) supporting any standards (including encryption standards) required by CAKE.com.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">3.5. Changes to CAKE.com Tools.</strong></em> From time to time, CAKE.com may change or discontinue, in whole or in part, the CAKE.com Tools or the Services. Future versions of the CAKE.com Tools and of the Services may not be compatible with Add-Ons developed using previous versions of the CAKE.com Tools or Services. CAKE.com is unable to provide notice of the changes to developers individually and will have no liability resulting from the actions described in this paragraph.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">4. Your Use Rights.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">4.1. License to the CAKE.com Tools.</strong></em> Subject to your compliance with these Terms and all Applicable Policies, CAKE.com hereby grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable and revocable right and license to: download; install; use; embed where technically necessary and, solely as may be embedded in your Add-On and via the CAKE.com Marketplace, distribute; the CAKE.com Tools for the sole purpose of developing, using and distributing Add-Ons for use with the Services. Usage Limits. From time to time and in its sole discretion, CAKE.com may place general limits on access to or usage of the CAKE.com Tools (e.g., limits on the number of calls or requests to APIs) or other aspects of the Services. CAKE.com may also monitor and limit your usage of the CAKE.com Tools or Services for any reason, including, for example, if CAKE.com believes that your usage is in breach of these Terms, may negatively affect the CAKE.com Tools or other aspects of the Services or may otherwise subject CAKE.com to liability. You agree to abide by any limitations on access, calls or use of the CAKE.com Tools that may be set by CAKE.com and will not attempt to circumvent such limits without the separate prior written consent of CAKE.com.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">4.2. Prohibited Uses.</strong></em> Except as expressly authorized by these Terms, any Applicable Policies or by a prior writing by CAKE.com, and with respect to the CAKE.com Tools, Developer Portal, Developer Account and any other element of the Services, you may not (nor authorize any third party to):</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">a)</strong></em> Use the CAKE.com Tools, Developer Portal and Developer Account except in connection with the Services and in accordance with these Terms, any other binding agreements between you and CAKE.com, Applicable Law and any Applicable Policies;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">b)</strong></em> Modify or create any derivative works of the Services;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">c)</strong></em> Take any action that would subject the Services to any third-party terms, including, without limitation, any “open source” software license terms;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">d)</strong></em> Make any calls to the CAKE.com Tools that are not driven by a request from an end user or the Add-On itself, other than as part of reasonable testing of your Add-Ons with the CAKE.com Tools;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">e)</strong></em> Reproduce, distribute, publicly perform, publicly display or otherwise make any portion of the Services available to any third party through any means, except to the extent embedding CAKE.com Tools may be technically necessary for the functioning of your Add-On provided that, in no event will the CAKE.com Tools be offered in any manner that would allow their extraction or use independent from the relevant Add-On;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">f)</strong></em> Use the Services to build a competitive product or offering, or in conjunction with Add-Ons that substantially replicate any features or functionality of Services;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">g)</strong></em> Use the Services to create any Content that: (i) infringes, misappropriates or violates a third party’s patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret, moral rights or other intellectual property rights, or rights of publicity or privacy; (ii) violates, or encourages any conduct that would violate, any Applicable Law or regulation or would give rise to civil liability; (iii) is fraudulent, false, misleading or deceptive; (iv) is defamatory, obscene, pornographic, vulgar or offensive; (v) promotes discrimination, bigotry, racism, hatred, harassment or harm against any individual or group; (vi) is violent or threatening or promotes violence or actions that are threatening to any person or entity; or (vii) promotes illegal or harmful activities or substances;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">h)</strong></em> Take any action that interferes with, damages or accesses or uses in any unauthorized manner the hardware, software, networks, technologies or other properties or Services of CAKE.com, any Enterprise User, Add-On User or other third party;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">i)</strong></em> Make any representations, guarantees or warranties (a) that violate any laws or regulations, including any false advertising or consumer protection laws, (b) with respect to CAKE.com, the CAKE.com Tools or CAKE.com’s product or Services or (c) by or on behalf of CAKE.com, including with respect to handling of Security Incidents;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">j)</strong></em> Circumvent or attempt to circumvent any technical requirements or limitations set by CAKE.com, except as permitted by law, or access, tamper with or attempt to probe, scan or test the vulnerability of any CAKE.com system or network or breach any security or authentication measures;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">k)</strong></em> Disassemble, decompile or otherwise reverse engineer the CAKE.com Tools or other elements of the Services, in whole or in part;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">l)</strong></em> Copy, distribute, sell, re-sell, sublicense, rent or lease the CAKE.com Tools, Services or any access key or developer credentials provided by CAKE.com or use such items for hosting, service provider or similar purposes;</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">m)</strong></em> Use the CAKE.com Marks or anything confusingly similar or that may create a connotation of false-endorsement by CAKE.com, in connection with any Add-On created by you, or in a manner that may create a sense of endorsement, sponsorship or false association with CAKE.com; or</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">n)</strong></em> Access the Services for competitive analysis, benchmarking or monitoring the availability, performance or functionality of the Services or to disseminate performance information (including uptime, response time and/or benchmarks) relating to the Services.</p>

Export Controls and Economic Sanctions.</strong></em> Developer will comply, and will not cause CAKE.com to not comply (by for example, using CAKE.com Tools under these Terms to develop an Add-On for which required export clearances have not been obtained), with all applicable export control and economic sanctions laws and regulations of the United States and any other applicable governmental authority, including the U.S. Export Administration Regulations.</p>

You will: (i) only use the CAKE.com Marks in the form and manner as set forth in any brand guidelines made available to you by CAKE.com and only in connection with the sale of your Add-Ons in the CAKE.com Marketplace (if any conflict, real or perceived, arises in the foregoing Guidelines, CAKE.com retains the right to enforce the more restrictive Guideline); (ii) follow any other policies that CAKE.com communicates to you regarding the use of CAKE.com Marks as keywords in online search engines; (iii) not register any domain names that contain any terms that are the same or similar to any CAKE.com Marks and (iv) upon expiration or termination of these Terms for any reason, immediately cease all use of the CAKE.com Marks, unless you are otherwise authorized to continue using the CAKE.com Marks pursuant to a separate written agreement with CAKE.com.</p>

Subject to your foregoing rights in the Content, CAKE.com retains all right, title and interest in and to the CAKE.com Marketplace, CAKE.com Tools, all CAKE.com products, Services and all technology, content, information, services, trademarks and other intellectual property used in connection with the foregoing.</p>

Indemnification Obligations.</strong></em> Developer will defend (at CAKE.com’s option), indemnify and hold harmless CAKE.com and its Representatives from and against any and all claims, actions, liabilities, losses, damages, judgments, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys’ fees) (collectively, “Claims”) brought by a third party arising out of or related to (a) any breach or alleged breach by Developer of these Terms, including any breach or alleged breach of Developer’s representations and/or warranties herein or (b) any Security Incidents arising from your Add-Ons, any third party services supporting your Add-Ons, or your use of the CAKE.com Tools. “Representatives” of a party means the party’s affiliates, and the party and its affiliates’ respective licensors, licensees, directors, officers, employees, contractors, agents, representatives and third-party service providers, along with the successors and assigns of the foregoing.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">6.2 Indemnification Process.</strong></em> CAKE.com will notify Developer promptly of any Claim(s) for which CAKE.com or any of its Representative seeks indemnification and, at CAKE.com’s option, may permit Developer to control the defense of such Claim(s) with counsel Developer chooses; provided that, Developer will not settle, compromise or resolve any such Claim(s) in a manner that imposes any liability or obligation on CAKE.com or any of its Representatives, or affects CAKE.com’s or any of its Representative’s rights, without obtaining CAKE.com’s or its applicable Representative’s prior written approval. In the event Developer is permitted to control the defense of any Claim(s), CAKE.com and any of its Representatives may, at its own expense, assist in the defense of such Claim(s) if it so chooses with counsel of its own choosing.</p>

<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">8. Termination.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">8.1. Term.</strong></em> These Terms will enter into force on the date you agree to them in the manner set forth in the first paragraph of these Terms and will continue until you or CAKE.com terminate them (the “Term”).</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">8.2. Termination Rights.</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">a)</strong></em> Either CAKE.com or you are entitled to terminate (i) these Terms, in their entirety or with respect to particular Add-Ons or CAKE.com Tools and (ii) access to your Developer Account with thirty (30) days advance written notice to the other party. In addition, either party may terminate these Terms upon written notice to the other party if (1) the other party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or other proceeding relating to insolvency, or makes an assignment for the benefit of creditors, (2) the other party breaches its confidentiality, security or privacy related obligations under these Terms or (3) the other party infringes or misappropriates the terminating party’s intellectual property rights.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">b)</strong></em> Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in these Terms, immediately upon notice to you (or with the notice specified by CAKE.com at the time), CAKE.com may also terminate these Terms (and/or terminate or suspend either your Developer Account or these Terms with respect to any particular Add-Ons or CAKE.com Tools) under the following circumstances: (i) CAKE.com ceases to operate the Marketplace or to offer the CAKE.com Tools, (ii) you violate any Applicable Policies or (iii) CAKE.com determines (in its discretion) that your use of the Services could result in legal or business liability to CAKE.com or any third party or otherwise harm the Services or other Developers or Add-On Users.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">8.3. Effect of Termination.</strong></em> Upon any suspension or termination of these Terms, all licenses or permissions granted to you hereunder will terminate and you must cease using the CAKE.com Tools and CAKE.com Marks and, at CAKE.com’s request, return or destroy all Confidential Information, including all copies of the CAKE.com Tools, within fifteen (15) days of termination. After termination, you will have no further access to the Developer Portal, your Developer Account or to any data or content that you submitted to CAKE.com, including your Add-On and any Product Information.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">Survival.</strong></em> The following sections of these Terms will survive termination or expiration of these Terms: — Section 5 (Intellectual Property)
— Section 6 (Indemnification)
— Section 10 (Disclaimer of Warranties)
— Section 11 (Confidential Information)
— Section 12 (Limitation of Liability)
— Section 13 ( Dispute Resolution; Governing Law)].</p>
