href="/clockify/build/manifest/structured-settings.html"><div class="menuItemActive_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Settings</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/developer-account.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Developer Account</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Authentication and Authorization</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/environments-and-regions.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Environment and Regions</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/window-events.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Window Events</span></div></a></div></div></div></section><section class="rspress-sidebar-section mt-0.5 block" data-context="sidebar-publish-clockify" style="margin-left: 0px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" data-context="sidebar-publish-clockify" style="border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="py-2 px-3 text-sm font-medium flex" style="font-size: 14px; padding-left: 24px; font-weight: bold;"><span class="flex-center" style="font-size: 14px;">PUBLISH</span></h2></div><div class="transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out" style="overflow: hidden;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-group transition-opacity duration-500 ease-in-out" style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 12px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/development-checklist.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Development Checklist</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="structured-settings" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Structured settings<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#structured-settings">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="definition" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Definition<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#definition">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/ui-settings.0cf5991f.png" alt="Settings UI example" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Structured settings are a way for you to easily and declaratively create a UI for the settings of your add-on.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Structured settings are a great way to get started with building the settings for your add-on while ensuring they integrate flawlessly with Clockify's UI and follow the same <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.figma.com/@cake_dot_com" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">styling guidelines</a> as Clockify does.
The structure of the settings is flexible and capable of building and supporting complex settings structures and UIs.</p>
<h3 id="interactions" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Interactions<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#interactions">#</a></h3>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">UI</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Clockify handles building and rendering the UI for the add-on settings, as well as persisting the settings whenever they are updated.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">APIs</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Clockify exposes a <a href="#endpoints" class="link_3b154 ">set of APIs</a> that add-ons can use to retrieve and update their settings for a particular workspace.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Lifecycle</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Add-ons can subscribe to the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/manifest/lifecycle.html#settings-updated">settings updated</a> lifecycle event to be notified whenever the settings are updated.</p>
<h2 id="properties" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Properties<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#properties">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This section will briefly describe the structure of the settings definition. More details and possible values for a particular field can be found under the <code>definitions</code> list of the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/manifest/index.html">manifest schema</a> for the manifest version that you are targeting.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Settings are organized by nesting tabs and groups. Values and types of the settings must be compatible.</p>
<h3 id="tabs" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Tabs<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tabs">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Tabs are at the top level of hierarchy when defining settings.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Tabs cannot be nested in other tabs or groups, and they need to have at least one type of settings defined.
If the <code>groups</code> property is defined, it needs to have at least one <code>settings</code> property defined in it.
For more information on <code>groups</code>, check out the <a href="#groups" class="link_3b154 ">Groups</a> section.</p>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Property</th>
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Required</th>
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">id</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Tab identifier</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Tab name, will be displayed on the UI</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">header</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Text shown on the settings header</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">settings</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">List of <a href="#settings" class="link_3b154 ">settings</a> contained in the tab</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">groups</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">List of <a href="#groups" class="link_3b154 ">groups</a> contained in the tab</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example</p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>"settings": {
    "tabs": [
    {
        "id": "Tab id",
        "name": "Tab one title",
        "header": {
            "title": "Title text"
        },
        "groups": [
            {
                "id": "Group id",
                "title": "Group one title",
                "description": "Group description",
                "header": {
                    "title": "Header title"
                },
                "settings": [
                    {
                        "id": "Setting id",
                        "name": "Default setting",
                        "description": "Description of default setting",
                        "placeholder": "Default setting here...",
                        "type": "TXT",
                        "value": "Value of default setting",
                        "required": true,
                        "copyable": true,
                        "readOnly": false, 
                        "accessLevel": "ADMINS"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ],
        "settings": [
            {
                "id": "Tab setting",
                "name": "Tab setting",
                "type": "TXT",
                "value": "Some value",
                "required": true,
                "accessLevel": "EVERYONE"
            }
        ]
    }
]}
]
</code></div></div>
<h3 id="groups" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Groups<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#groups">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Groups are a way to link related settings. Group can be part of tabs, and one tab can contain multiple groups.</p>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Property</th>
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Required</th>
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">id</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Group identifier</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">title</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Group title, will be displayed on the UI</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Brief description the settings group</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">header</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Text shown on the group header</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">settings</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">List of <a href="#settings" class="link_3b154 ">settings</a> contained in the group</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example</p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>"groups": [
            {
                "id": "Group id",
                "title": "Group one title",
                "description": "Group description",
                "header": {
                    "title": "Header title"
                },
                "settings": [
                    {
                        "id": "Setting id",
                        "name": "Default setting",
                        "description": "Description of default setting",
                        "placeholder": "Default setting here...",
                        "type": "TXT",
                        "value": "Value of default setting",
                        "required": true,
                        "copyable": true,
                        "readOnly": false,
                        "accessLevel": "ADMINS"
                    }
                ]
            }
]
</code></div></div>
<h3 id="settings" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Settings<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#settings">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This is the actual settings object which defines the individual setting elements.</p>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Property</th>
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Required</th>
<th class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">id</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Unique identifier for the settings property</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Property name, will be displayed on the UI</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Brief description of the property</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">placeholder</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Placeholder that will be displayed if the value empty</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Settings’ type. Each type is displayed differently on the UI</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">key</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Serves as the key for the settings when retrieved as key value pairs</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">value</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Settings’ value. It must match with the type of settings defined in the <code>type</code> property</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">allowedValues</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no*</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">List of allowed values for settings of the dropdown type. *Required if type of settings is DROPDOWN_SINGLE or DROPDOWN_MULTIPLE</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">required</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Defines if the setting is required</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">copyable</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Defines if a ‘Copy’ button will be added next to the setting value on the UI</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">readOnly</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Defines if the setting value is read-only</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">accessLevel</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Defines the access level a user must have in order to access this setting</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example</p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>"settings": [
    {
        "id": "Setting id",
        "name": "Default setting",
        "description": "Description of default setting",
        "placeholder": "Default setting here...",
        "type": "TXT",
        "value": "Value of default setting",
        "required": true,
        "copyable": true,
        "readOnly": false,
        "accessLevel": "ADMINS"
     }
]
</code></div></div>
<h2 id="endpoints" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Endpoints<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#endpoints">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Clockify exposes the following API endpoints which can be used to interact with the stored settings of an add-on:</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The requests to these APIs must be <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">authenticated</a>.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">Retrieving Settings</strong></em></p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>Headers:
X-Addon-Token: {token}

GET /addon/workspaces/{workspaceId}/settings
</code></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The endpoint requires the following parameters:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">workspaceId – ID of workspace where the add-on is installed, can be retrieved from the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html#claims">claims present in the authentication token</a></li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The settings are specific to an add-on installation on a given workspace.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Sample Response:</p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>{
    "tabs": [
        {
            "name": "Tab one title",
            "id": "tab one id",
            "groups": [
                {
                    "id": "group nested in tab",
                    "title": "Group title",
                    "description": "group description",
                    "header": {
                        "title": "Header title"
                    },
                    "settings": [
                        {
                            "id": "Setting id",
                            "name": "Default setting",
                            "description": "Description of default setting",
                            "placeholder": "Default setting here...",
                            "type": "TXT",
                            "value": "Value of default setting",
                            "required": true,
                            "copyable": true,
                            "readOnly": false,
                            "accessLevel": "ADMINS"

                        }
                    ]
                }
            ],
            "header": {
                "title": "title header 2"
            },
            "settings": [
                {
                    "id": "Setting id 2",
                    "name": "Default setting",
                    "description": "Description of default setting",
                    "placeholder": "Default setting here...",
                    "type": "TXT",
                    "value": "Value of default setting 2",
                    "required": true,
                    "copyable": true,
                    "readOnly": false,
                    "accessLevel": "ADMINS"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
</code></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">Updating settings</strong></em></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The following endpoint can be used to update one or more add-on settings by providing the unique settings IDs.</p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>Headers:
X-Addon-Token: {token}

PATCH /addon/workspaces/{workspaceId}/settings

[
    {    
         "id": "settingId",
         "value": "New value of setting"
    }
]
</code></div></div></div><div class="rspress-doc-footer"><footer class="mt-8"><div class="xs:flex pb-5 px-2 justify-end items-center"></div><div class="flex flex-col"></div><div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:justify-around gap-4 pt-6"><div class="prev_e7091 flex flex-col"><a class="link_03735 pager-link_9b9a7 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/manifest/webhooks.html"><span class="desc_9b9a7">Previous Page</span><span class="title_9b9a7">Webhooks</span></a></div><div class="next_e7091 flex flex-col"><a class="link_03735 pager-link_9b9a7 next_9b9a7 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/developer-account.html"><span class="desc_9b9a7">Next Page</span><span class="title_9b9a7">Developer Account</span></a></div></div></footer></div></div></div><button class="scroll-to-top_1a167 "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" class="w-6 h-6"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M11.47 2.47a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0l7.5 7.5a.75.75 0 1 1-1.06 1.06l-6.22-6.22V21a.75.75 0 0 1-1.5 0V4.81l-6.22 6.22a.75.75 0 1 1-1.06-1.06l7.5-7.5Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg></button><div class="aside-container_edeb4"><div><div class="flex flex-col"><div class="&lt;lg:hidden"><div id="aside-container" class="relative text-sm font-medium"><div class="leading-7 block text-sm font-semibold pl-3">ON THIS PAGE</div><nav class="mt-1"><ul text-text-2 block" style="margin-left: 0px;"><span class="aside-link-text block">Properties</span></a></li><li><a href="#tabs" title="Tabs" class="aside-link transition-all duration-300 duration-300 hover:text-text-1 text-text-2 block" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="aside-link-text block">Groups</span></a></li><li><a href="#settings" title="Settings" class="aside-link data-context="sidebar-learn-pumble" style="margin-left: 0px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" data-context="sidebar-learn-pumble" ease-in-out" style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 12px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/learn/introduction.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Introduction</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/learn/quick-start.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" Account</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Interactivity</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" 0;"><span>Modals &amp; Views</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/advanced-concepts.html"><div class="menuItemActive_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Advanced Concepts</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/pumble-cli.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Pumble CLI</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/triggers-reference.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Triggers</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactive-elements-reference.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Interactive Elements</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/api-client.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Api Client</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/blocks.html"><div class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" data-context="sidebar-publish-pumble" style="border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="py-2 px-3 text-sm font-medium flex" style="font-size: 14px; padding-left: 24px; font-weight: bold;"><span class="flex-center" style="font-size: 14px;">PUBLISH</span></h2></div><div class="transition-all
