class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="advanced-concepts" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Advanced Concepts<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#advanced-concepts">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="authorization" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Authorization<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#authorization">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Pumble uses OAuth2 in order to allow your app to access the API.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">User first clicks on a link to Install/Authorize your app. This link can either be through Pumble's <code>Configure Apps</code> page or externally through a website.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">This link will open the Pumble Consent screen that will display the scopes that are requested.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">User clicks <code>Allow</code>, and Pumble will redirect the user to your <code>redirectUrl</code>. Pumble will add a query parameter to this url called <code>code</code>.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Using this code and your <code>clientSecret</code>  (that is returned when you <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html">create your app</a>) you will be able to generate an access token.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">With this access token you will be able to use the pumble api.</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The link that will open the Pumble consent screen is in this format:</p>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>https://app.pumble.com/access-request?redirectUrl=&lt;REDIRECT_URL&gt;&amp;clientId=&lt;CLIENT_ID&gt;&amp;scopes=&lt;SCOPES&gt;&amp;defaultWorkspaceId=&lt;DEFAULT_WORKSPACE_ID&gt;&amp;isReinstall=true
</code></div></div>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">required</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">redirectUrl</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The redirect url where user will be redirected after they click <code>Allow</code>. This redirect url must match one of your app's <code>redirectUrls</code>. This means that if you have a redirect url of <code>https://example.com/redirect</code> it will match <code>https://example.com/redirect/other</code> but not <code>https://example.com</code></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">clientId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The id of your app</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">scopes</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">yes</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The scopes that you have defined in your manifest.  These scopes are send as a comma separated list of user scopes + bot scopes. Bot scopes however are prepended with <code>bot:</code>, for example: <code>messages:read,messages:write,bot:messages:read,bot:messages:write</code>. Scopes can be only a subset or the full list of scopes that you have defined in your manifest. To view a list of all scopes, click <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/api-client.html#scopes">here</a></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">defaultWorkspaceId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The default workspace id to open consent screen to. Users will have the option to change the workspace, but when <code>defaultWorkspaceId</code> is provided that workspace will be preselected.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">isReinstall</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">If you need to reauthorize the bot with new scopes, reInstallation is required, sending this query parameter with <code>true</code> will trigger a reinstallation, and therefore bot will be reauthorized</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After user authorizes, they will be redirected to the specified <code>redirectUrl</code>, the authorization code will be in the <code>code</code> query parameter of the <code>redirectUrl</code>.
Using this code and your <code>clientSecret</code> provided when <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html">creating your app</a> you will be able to generate the access token for that user and for your bot.</p>
<div class="language-sh"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-sh" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>curl 
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>curl --location 'https://api-ga.pumble.com/oauth2/access' \
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span>--form 'client-id="&lt;&lt;YOUR CLIENT ID&gt;&gt;"' \
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span>--form 'client-secret="&lt;&lt;YOUR CLIENT SECRET&gt;&gt;"' \
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span>--form 'code="&lt;&lt;AUTHORIZATION CODE&gt;&gt;"'</span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After this request you will receive back this payload:</p>
<div class="language-json"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-json" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"accessToken"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;User's access token&gt;&gt;"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"botToken"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;Bot's access token&gt;&gt;"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"userId"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;User Id&gt;&gt;"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"botId"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;Bot Id in that workspace&gt;&gt;"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"workspaceId"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;Workspace ID&gt;&gt;"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">If your app requires a bot user, <code>botToken</code> and <code>botId</code> will be returned on every authorization.
However it's good practice to always save them since one of these authorizations might be a reinstallation, therefore a new bot token is generated and the old one is invalidated.</p>
<div class="rspress-directive tip"><div class="rspress-directive-title">TIP</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">Access tokens generated do not need to be refreshed.<br>
They can however be invalidated by the user (when users unauthorize)
</p></div></div>
<h3 id="using-the-sdk" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Using the SDK<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#using-the-sdk">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Pumble SDK provides an easy way to set up the redirect page to capture authorization codes, generate access tokens and store them.
All you need to do is setup a Token Store in your app, and enable redirect.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    tokenStore</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">JsonFileTokenStore</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'tokens.json'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	redirect</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> enable</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//... Triggers</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In order to return a custom page / response when user authorizes or access token generation fails all you need to do is override
<code>onSuccess</code> and <code>onError</code> callbacks in the <code>redirect</code> configuration.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    tokenStore</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">JsonFileTokenStore</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'tokens.json'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    redirect</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        enable</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">onSuccess</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>tokens</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// This is called after tokens are saved in the store (if provided any)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>            response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">send</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Authorization completed'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>        </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">onError</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>error</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>            response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">status</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token number">401</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">send</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Could not authorize'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//... Triggers</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">If <code>onSuccess</code> or <code>onError</code> overridden, please make sure to always return a <code>response</code>
</p></div></div>
<h2 id="token-store" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Token Store<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#token-store">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Token store is the mechanism Pumble SDK uses to save the Access Tokens after they are generated and to get <code>ApiClient</code> in the relevant contexts.<br>
Pumble SDK provides to pre-implemented token stores: <code>JsonFileTokenStore</code> and <code>MongoDbTokenStore</code>.<br>
You can also implement your own custom store by just providing an implementation with this interface:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">export</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">interface</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">CredentialsStore</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getBotToken</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>workspaceId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">Promise</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">undefined</span><span class="token operator">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getUserToken</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        workspaceId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        workspaceUserId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">Promise</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">undefined</span><span class="token operator">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getBotUserId</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>workspaceId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">Promise</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">undefined</span><span class="token operator">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">saveTokens</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>accessTokenResponse</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> OAuth2AccessTokenResponse</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">Promise</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">void</span><span class="token operator">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">initialize</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">Promise</span><span class="token operator">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">void</span><span class="token operator">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<h2 id="adding-new-http-routes" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Adding new HTTP routes<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#adding-new-http-routes">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Internally Pumble SDK is using an <code>express.js</code> http server to receive events from Pumble and to expose the redirect endpoint.
However in case you need to add your custom endpoints you have two alternatives:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Create another HTTP server in a different port</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Extend the existing HTTP server</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To extend the existing HTTP server all you have to do is add <code>onServerConfiguring</code> in the <code>App</code></p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">onServerConfiguring</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>express</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        express</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"/my_custom_endpoint"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> userClient </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getUserClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;workspace_id&gt;&gt;"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"&lt;&lt;user_id&gt;&gt;"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">send</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"My response"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//... Triggers</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Notice that in this callback you also have access to the <code>addon</code> object, which provides you with some helper methods to get <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/api-client.html">ApiClients</a>, access <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html">manifest</a>, generate OAuth2 url etc.</p>
<h2 id="handling-errors" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Handling Errors<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#handling-errors">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The addon will emit errors every time some uncaught error occurs in one of your event handlers.
In order to capture these errors use the code below:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">function</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">main</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> addon </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">start</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>app</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">onError</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>error</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Error handling event: "</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> error</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">main</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<h2 id="request-signature-verification" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Request Signature Verification<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#request-signature-verification">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Every request that is coming from Pumble is signed using your <code>signingSecret</code>.
While the <code>Pumble SDK</code> does this automatically, below is and explanation how the verification is done:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">function</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">verifySignature</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>signingSecret</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-constant);">TIMESTAMP_HEADER</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'x-pumble-request-timestamp'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-constant);">SIGNATURE_HEADER</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'x-pumble-request-signature'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">return</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>request</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> Request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> res</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> Response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> next</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> NextFunction</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> timestamp </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>headers</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-constant);">TIMESTAMP_HEADER</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> signature </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>headers</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-constant);">SIGNATURE_HEADER</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token operator">!</span><span>timestamp </span><span class="token operator">||</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">!</span><span>signature</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>            res</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">status</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token number">403</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">send</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Invalid signature!'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">return</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> rawBody </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>rawBody</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// The string to be signed is timestamp:rawBody</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> signingPayload </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">${</span><span class="token template-string interpolation">timestamp</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">:</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">${</span><span class="token template-string interpolation">rawBody</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> hmac </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> crypto</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">createHmac</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'sha256'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> signingSecret</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> testSignature </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> hmac
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">update</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>signingPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">digest</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">toString</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'hex'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>testSignature </span><span class="token operator">!==</span><span> signature</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>            res</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">status</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token number">403</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">send</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Invalid signature!'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">return</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">next</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
