flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="interactivity" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Interactivity<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#interactivity">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="interactive-messages" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Interactive messages<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#interactive-messages">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Pumble's interactive messages enhance communication by allowing users to perform actions directly within the message interface.
These messages can include buttons, select menus, and other interactive elements, enabling users to respond to requests, provide feedback, or trigger workflows without leaving the conversation.</p>
<h3 id="compose-your-interactive-message" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Compose your interactive message<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#compose-your-interactive-message">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Adding interactive components is similar to adding any other <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/blocks.html">block</a>. The following example provides insight on how to add buttons in an actions block within a message payload:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"John requests read permission for the header design document."</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    blocks</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>            elements</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                    type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_section"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                    elements</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                            type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                            text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"John requests read permission for the header design document."</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>            type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"actions"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>            elements</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>                    type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"button"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>                    onAction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"approve_btn"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>                    value</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"some-metadata"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span><span>                    text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span><span>                        text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Approve"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span><span>                        type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"plain_text"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">28</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">29</span><span>                    style</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"primary"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">30</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">31</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">32</span><span>                    type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"button"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">33</span><span>                    onAction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"reject_btn"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">34</span><span>                    text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">35</span><span>                        text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Reject"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">36</span><span>                        type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"plain_text"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">37</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">38</span><span>                    style</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"danger"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">39</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">40</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">41</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">42</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">43</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"in_channel"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You can replace buttons with other interactive elements based on your needs. After composing and sending such a message, it should soon be visible in your channel.</p>
<h3 id="handle-interactive-payload" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Handle interactive payload<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#handle-interactive-payload">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">When a user interacts with an interactive component published by your app in Pumble, block interaction payload will be sent to your app.
This payload notifies your app about the interaction and provides a bundle of information about relevant details of the interaction. Understanding this payload is crucial for your app to process interactions effectively.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Pumble delivers this payload to your app's configured handlers.
The payload includes all the contextual information your app requires to determine the type and specifics of the interaction.<br>
Inside the payload, there is a <code>value</code> field that represents the actionable input value. For example, it corresponds to the <code>value</code> field from a button or the <code>value</code> field from a selected option if a select menu is used.<br>
Interaction payload for previous message when <em>Approve</em> button is pressed:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>interactionPayload </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    workspaceId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"668478600000000000000000"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    userId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"668478600000000000000000"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    channelId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"668478600000000000000000"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    sourceType</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"MESSAGE"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    sourceId</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"668478600000000000000000"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>    actionType</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"button"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>    onAction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"approve_btn"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>    payload</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> value</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"some-metadata"</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">as</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Take a look at following example on how to handle interactive payload based on previous message.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Inside your app's definition (like <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/CAKE-com/pumble-node-sdk/blob/master/playground/example-1.ts" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">here</a>), add following code:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>blockInteraction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    interactions</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>            sourceType</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"MESSAGE"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            handlers</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"approve_btn"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> ctx </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>payload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// additional stuff you want to do</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Approved"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"in_channel"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"reject_btn"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> ctx </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>payload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// additional stuff you want to do</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Rejected"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"in_channel"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive note"><div class="rspress-directive-title">NOTE</div><div class="rspress-directive-content">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>approve_btn</code> handler must correspond to the button's <code>onAction</code> field to correctly handle button interaction events.</p>
</div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For more types of interactive elements, click <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactive-elements-reference.html">here</a>.</p>
<h2 id="dynamic-select-menus" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Dynamic select menus<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#dynamic-select-menus">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Dynamic select menu is interactive element that loads its options from an external data source, allowing for a dynamic list of options.
Each time a select menu of this type is opened or the user starts typing in the typeahead field, we'll send a request to your app.
For more details about dynamic select menu properties, see <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactive-elements-reference.html">this</a>.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Your app should provide handlers that will be called each time user interacts with dynamic select menu.
The handler should return an array of options or option groups. See the following example.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Inside your app's definition (like <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/CAKE-com/pumble-node-sdk/blob/master/playground/example-1.ts" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">here</a>), add following code:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>dynamicMenus</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        onAction</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"dynamic_menu_1"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">producer</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">return</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"plain_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Option 1"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> value</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"1"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"plain_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Option 2"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> value</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"2"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive note"><div class="rspress-directive-title">NOTE</div><div class="rspress-directive-content">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>onAction</code> must match the <code>onAction</code> field of the dynamic select menu, otherwise the handler won't be called.</p>
</div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The provided handler will be executed when the following message is sent:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Dynamic select menu"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    blocks</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"actions"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

1.4l-1.4 1.4c-.2.2-.5.3-.7.3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-hidden="true" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="hidden dark:block" width="18" height="18" fill="currentColor"><path class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" data-context="sidebar-publish-pumble" style="border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="py-2 flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="developer-account" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Developer Account<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#developer-account">#</a></h1>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Get started with Pumble developer tools.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Start building add-ons for the Pumble app, the team communication tool that helps businesses stay connected and organized. Whether you're an individual developer or a company, Pumble provides everything you need to bring your add-ons to life, from setup to scaling in the CAKE.com Marketplace.</p>
<h2 id="create-developer-account" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Create Developer Account<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#create-developer-account">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Before publishing your first Pumble add-on, you need a CAKE.com developer account. Here's how to create one:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Go to the <a href="#" class="link_3b154 ">CAKE.com developer page</a></li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Click Sign up and enter your email address</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Verify your email (within 24 hours)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Fill in your name, password, and accept the Terms of Use</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Once completed, you'll get access to your developer dashboard</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Use your account to:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Build and manage your add-ons</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Publish and maintain versions in the Marketplace</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="publish-your-first-add-on" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Publish Your First Add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#publish-your-first-add-on">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">With your developer account set up, you're ready to publish your Pumble add-on:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Log in to your developer account</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Go to the Add-ons page</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Click Create Add-on and follow the two-step form:</li>
</ol>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><strong class="font-semibold">Step 1 – Basic Info:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Add icon</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Name</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Manifest URL</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Choose Pumble as the product</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><strong class="font-semibold">Step 2 – Listing Info:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Provide a description</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Category</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Privacy policy</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Optional terms</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Visuals (images, demo video, etc.)</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Once completed, submit for review. The review process typically takes up to two weeks.</p></div><div class="rspress-doc-footer"><footer class="mt-8"><div class="xs:flex pb-5 px-2 justify-end items-center"></div><div class="flex flex-col"></div><div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:justify-around gap-4 pt-6"><div class="prev_e7091 flex flex-col"><a class="link_03735 pager-link_9b9a7 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/learn/quick-start.html"><span class="desc_9b9a7">Previous Page</span><span class="title_9b9a7">Quick Start</span></a></div><div class="next_e7091 flex flex-col"><a class="link_03735 pager-link_9b9a7 next_9b9a7 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html"><span class="desc_9b9a7">Next Page</span><span class="title_9b9a7">Manifest</span></a></div></div></footer></div></div></div><button class="scroll-to-top_1a167 "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" class="w-6 h-6"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M11.47 2.47a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0l7.5 7.5a.75.75 0 1 1-1.06 1.06l-6.22-6.22V21a.75.75 0 0 1-1.5 0V4.81l-6.22 6.22a.75.75 0 1 1-1.06-1.06l7.5-7.5Z" font-medium"><div class="leading-7 block text-sm font-semibold pl-3">ON THIS PAGE</div><nav class="mt-1"><ul class="relative"><li><a href="#create-developer-account" title="Create Developer Account" Account</span></a></li><li><a href="#publish-your-first-add-on" title="Publish Your First Add-on" class="aside-link transition-all duration-300 hover:text-text-1 text-text-2 block" style="margin-left:
