</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"text"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"For more info visit our "</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"link"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"text"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"website"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"url"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://pumble.com"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<h4 id="quote-section" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154">Quote section<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#quote-section">#</a></h4>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Besides the <code>type</code> field (<code>type: "rich_text_quote"</code>), the quote section also has an <code>elements</code> array. Its objects are the same as in the text section.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_quote"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"text"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Quote with "</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"broadcast"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"range"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"here"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"text"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">" mention"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This example results in</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Quote with @here mention</p>
</blockquote>
<h4 id="code-block-section" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154">Code block section<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#code-block-section">#</a></h4>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The code block section (<code>type: "rich_text_preformatted"</code>) also has the <code>elements</code> array which consists of only one <code>text</code> object without any formatting.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For example:</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_preformatted"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"border"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"text"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"public static void main(String[] args) {\n    System.out.println(\"Hello Pumble!\");\n}"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This example results in</p>
<div class="language-java"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-java" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">main</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">String</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span> args</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token class-name">System</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>out</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">println</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Hello Pumble!"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<h4 id="list-section" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154">List section<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#list-section">#</a></h4>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">A list section contains 5 attributes:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><code>style</code> - Determines the type of the list, with <code>ordered</code> and <code>bullet</code> as possible values.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><code>indent</code> - Determines the indentation level of the list. It accepts a value in the range from 0 to 4, inclusive.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><code>border</code> - Determines if the list has a border on the leftmost side, similar to the quote section. Possible values are 0 for no border and 1 for a border to be displayed.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><code>offset</code> - Indicates that the list is a continuation of a previous list section of the same indent. The value of this parameter is an integer, denoting how many items were in a previous list section(s) so that the UI can know where to continue counting the indices. This field only appears in <code>ordered</code> lists.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><code>elements</code> - Elements in a list section aren’t regular items like in other sections, they are text sections. Each of those text sections represents one item in the list visually and can hold all the items a regular text section can.</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The largest continuous run of list items with the same indent level will be formatted under the same list section. For an item with a different indent level, a new list section will be created.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Ordered lists are enumerated based on their indent level. Lists indented with 0 and 3 use Arabic numerals as indexes, lists indented with 1 and 4 use alphabetical indexes, and lists indented with 2 use Roman numeral indexes.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Unordered lists have three different bullet types: a filled circle '●' for indents 0 and 3, an empty circle '○' for indents 1 and 4, and a filled square '■' for indent 2.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For example:</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In the example above, there are four list sections, all with <code>style: "ordered"</code>.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">The first section has an indentation of 0 and one item, which is a text section with one text item.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">The second section has an indentation of 1 and one item, similar to the first.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">The third section has an indentation of 2 and two items, each of which is a text section with one text item.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">The fourth section is a continuation of the first list section. It has an indentation of 0 and offset of 1 to indicate that the indices in it are offset by the count of the items in the first list.</li>
</ul>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_list"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"style"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"ordered"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"indent"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"border"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_section"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>                            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>                                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>                                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"text"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"first item"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>                            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>                        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">70</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"offset"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">71</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">72</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">73</span><span>                        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_section"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">84</span><span>                            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">92</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">93</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">94</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Unordered list example:</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Similarly to the first example, here we actually have 3 list sections.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"elements"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"type"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"rich_text_list"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"style"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"bullet"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"indent"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"border"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>                            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>                        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>                    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>                </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"style"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"bullet"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

<h2 id="interactive-blocks-formatting" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Interactive blocks formatting<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#interactive-blocks-formatting">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Blocks also support interactive elements. For more details, check out <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactivity.html">interactivity</a>.</p></div><div
