px-3 text-sm font-medium flex" style="font-size: 14px; padding-left: 24px; font-weight: bold;"><span class="flex-center" style="font-size: 14px;">PUBLISH</span></h2></div><div class="transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out" style="overflow: hidden;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-group transition-opacity duration-500 ease-in-out" style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 12px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="overview" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Overview<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#overview">#</a></h1>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The manifest is your App's configuration that should be registered in Pumble.<br>
All the information that Pumble needs to know about your app exists in that configuration.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This guide will show you how you can manually create and update your apps.<br>
You can also use <code>pumble-cli</code> instead of maintaining your apps manually which will automate this process for you, and will expose only the relevant details.\</p>
<h2 id="creating-an-app" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Creating an app<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#creating-an-app">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To manually create an app with a manifest you should send a request to this Pumble API endpoint:</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>POST https://api-ga.pumble.com/workspaces/{workspace_id}/workspaceUsers/{workspace_user_id}/apps</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">with this json body see <a href="#manifest-payload" class="link_3b154 ">Manifest Payload</a>:</p>
<div class="language-json"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-json" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"name"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"my_app"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"displayName"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"My App"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"bot"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"botTitle"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"My App Bot Description"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"socketMode"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">false</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"scopes"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"botScopes"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"messages:read"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"messages:write"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"userScopes"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"messages:read"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"messages:write"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"shortcuts"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"shortcutType"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"ON_MESSAGE"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"url"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/onmessage"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"name"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"message_shortcut"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"displayName"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Message Shortcut"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"description"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Message Shortcut Description"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"shortcutType"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"GLOBAL"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"url"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/global"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">28</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"name"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"global_shortcut"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">29</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"displayName"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Global Shortcut"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">30</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"description"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Global Shortcut Description"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">31</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">32</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">33</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"slashCommands"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">34</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">35</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"command"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"/my_slash_command"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">36</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"url"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/slash"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">37</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"description"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Google Calendar commands"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">38</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"usageHint"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"/my_slash_command [first][second]"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">39</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">40</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">41</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"eventSubscriptions"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">42</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"url"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/events"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">43</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"events"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">44</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"APP_UNAUTHORIZED"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">45</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"APP_UNINSTALLED"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">46</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"NEW_MESSAGE"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">47</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">48</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">49</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"redirectUrls"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">50</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/redirect"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">51</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">52</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"helpUrl"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/help"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">53</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"listingUrl"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"https://myapp.com/install-on-pumble"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">54</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"welcomeMessage"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Hello :wave:"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">55</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"offlineMessage"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"We are experiencing some issues at the moment. Please try again later"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">56</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive info"><div class="rspress-directive-title">INFO</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">All the requests to manage your apps, need to you use <code>Authtoken</code> header. <br>
You can get this value in <code>~/.pumblerc</code> file <code>PUMBLE_ACCESS_TOKEN</code> after you login with <code>npx pumble-cli login</code>
</p></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You will get a response  with the full Manifest and your app's secrets</p>
<div class="language-json"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-json" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//...your manifest</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"id"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"..."</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"clientSecret"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"..."</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"appKey"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"..."</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"signingSecret"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"..."</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">id</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Your app's id. This will be used as the clientId in OAuth2 request. See <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/advanced-concepts.html#authorization">Authorization</a>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">clientSecret</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Your app's clientSecret. This will be used to generate access tokens. See <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/advanced-concepts.html#authorization">Authorization</a>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">appKey</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Your app's  secret key. This should be sent on every Pumble request along with the access token. See <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build//api-client.html">API</a></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">signingKey</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Your app's signing key. Pumble will sign every request that will be sent to your endpoints with this key. See Verifying <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build//advanced-concepts.html#request-signature-verification">Signature</a>.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="updating-an-app" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Updating an app<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#updating-an-app">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To update your app you should send the updated manifest in this url:</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>PUT https://api-ga.pumble.com/workspaces/{workspace_id}/workspaceUsers/{workspace_user_id}/apps/{app_id}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The secrets will remain unchanged.</p>
<h2 id="listing-your-apps" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Listing your apps<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#listing-your-apps">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To view a list of your created apps use this url:</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>GET https://api-ga.pumble.com/workspaces/{workspace_id}/workspaceUsers/{workspace_user_id}/apps/mine</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This list will not return secrets for every app</p>
<h2 id="get-your-app-manifest-along-with-its-secrets" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Get your app manifest (along with it's secrets)<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#get-your-app-manifest-along-with-its-secrets">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To get the full app manifest along with the secrets use this url</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>GET https://api-ga.pumble.com/workspaces/{workspace_id}/workspaceUsers/{workspace_user_id}/apps/mine/{app_id}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<h2 id="manifest-payload" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Manifest Payload<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#manifest-payload">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

</tr>

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">null</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A valid url that will open when user clicks on <code>Install</code> or <code>Authorize</code> in <code>Configure Apps</code> page. If this is not specified Pumble will open the consent screen for you app, with all the scopes selected and the first <code>redirectUrl</code> in your <code>redirectUrls</code></td>
</tr>

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">This message, if specified will be sent to all the users in the workspace when your app is first installed</td>
</tr>

</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Scopes that your app will use when making requests, or subscribing on events on behalf of users that have authorized</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="shortcuts" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Shortcuts<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#shortcuts">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">required</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">default</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>

<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">shortcutType</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">"ON_MESSAGE" | "GLOBAL"</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Specifies if the shortcut is a global or message shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">url</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Url where Pumble will send the signed request when the shortcut is triggered. You should respond to this request within 3 seconds to acknowledge</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Unique name across your app for the shortcut. Pumble will send this name when a trigger happens</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">displayName</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The name that will be shown in Pumble for this shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">false</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">null</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Description that users will see for this shortcut</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="slashcommands" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">SlashCommands<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#slashcommands">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">required</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">default</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">command</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The actual command that will be typed in Pumble's message editor. It should start with <code>/</code></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">url</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Url where Pumble will send the signed request when command is triggered. You should respond to this request within 3 seconds to acknowledge.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">false</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">null</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Description of the command</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">usageHint</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">false</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">null</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Usage hint of the command. It should include some hints for the text that should come after the slash command</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="events" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Events<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#events">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">required</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">default</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">url</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Url where Pumble events will be sent. These requests do not need to be acknowledged</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">events</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Array&lt;string&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">true</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">-</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">List of the events you want to subscribe. For more info read <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build//triggers-reference.html#events">Events</a></td>
</tr>
</tbody>

r="2" fill="currentColor"></circle><circle cx="24" cy="16" r="2" fill="currentColor"></circle></svg></button></div></div></div></div><section><div class="docLayout_edeb4 pt-0"><div 18h24v2H4zm0-12h24v2H4zm0 6h24v2H4z"></path></svg></div><span class="text-sm">Menu</span></button><button class="flex-center ml-auto"><span class="text-sm">ON THIS PAGE</span><div class="text-md mr-2" style="transform: rotate(0deg); transition: transform 0.2s ease-out; margin-top: 2px;"><svg width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 32 32"><path fill="currentColor" d="M22 16 12 26l-1.4-1.4 8.6-8.6-8.6-8.6L12 6z"></path></svg></div></button><div class="rspress-local-toc-container "><ul><li><a href="#clockify-add-on-basics" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 0px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">Clockify Add-on basics</span></a></li><li><a href="#what-is-the-structure-of-an-add-on" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">What is the structure of an add-on?</span></a></li><li><a href="#how-does-add-on-hosting-infrastructure-work" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">How does add-on hosting infrastructure work?</span></a></li><li><a href="#how-does-the-add-on-interact-with-the-clockify-api" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">How does the add-on interact with the Clockify API?</span></a></li><li><a href="#how-does-the-add-on-ui-integrate-with-clockify" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">How does the add-on UI integrate with Clockify?</span></a></li><li><a href="#how-does-the-add-on-ui-interact-with-clockify" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">How does the add-on UI interact with Clockify?</span></a></li><li><a href="#how-do-add-on-settings-work" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">How do add-on settings work?</span></a></li><li><a href="#how-does-an-add-on-work" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">How does an add-on work?</span></a></li><li><a href="#can-new-features-be-added-after-an-add-on-is-published" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 12px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">Can new features be added after an add-on is published?</span></a></li><li><a href="#developer-resources" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 0px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">Developer Resources</span></a></li><li><a href="#next-steps" class="rspress-toc-link sm:text-normal text-sm" style="margin-left: 0px;"><span class="rspress-toc-link-text block">Next steps</span></a></li></ul></div></div><aside class="sidebar_71eca rspress-sidebar "><div class="navTitleMask_71eca"><div class="navBarTitle_f6cde"><a class="link_03735 flex items-center w-full h-full text-base font-semibold transition-opacity duration-300 hover:opacity-60 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/index.html"><div class="mr-1 min-w-8"><img src="/logo-developers-dark.svg" alt="logo" id="logo" class="rspress-logo dark:hidden"><img src="/logo-developers-light.svg" alt="logo" id="logo" class="rspress-logo hidden dark:block"></div></a></div></div><div class="rspress-scrollbar sidebarContent_71eca"><nav class="pb-2"><div class="mp-select" tabindex="0"><div class="mp-select__container"><div class="mp-select__active " data-testid="select-active"><span class="mp-select__placeholder"><span class="flex justify-between"><span class="flex items-center"><span class="mr-2"><img src="/clockify-logo.svg"></span><span>Clockify Docs</span></span></span></span><div class="mp-select__arrow "><img src="/arrow-down.svg" alt="arrow"></div></div><div class="mp-select__options hidden"><div class="mp-select__options__content"><div whitespace-nowrap"><span class="flex justify-between"><span class="flex items-center"><span class="mr-2"><img src="/clockify-logo.svg"></span><span>Clockify w-full overflow-hidden overflow-ellipsis whitespace-nowrap"><span class="flex justify-between"><span class="flex items-center"><span class="mr-2"><img src="/pumble-logo.svg"></span><span>Pumble Docs</span></span></span></div><div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><section class="rspress-sidebar-section mt-0.5 block" data-context="sidebar-learn-clockify" style="margin-left: 0px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" data-context="sidebar-learn-clockify" style="border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out" style="overflow: hidden;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-group transition-opacity duration-500 ease-in-out" style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 12px;"><div style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Introduction</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Quick Start</span></div></a></div></div></div></section><section class="rspress-sidebar-section mt-0.5 block" data-context="sidebar-build-clockify" var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="py-2 px-3 text-sm font-medium flex" style="font-size: 14px; padding-left: 24px; font-weight: bold;"><span class="flex-center" style="font-size: style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 12px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><section class="rspress-sidebar-section mt-0.5 block" style="margin-left: 18px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" style="cursor: pointer;"><h2 class="py-2 px-3 text-sm font-medium flex"><span class="flex-center" style="font-size: 13px;">Manifest</span></h2><div class="collapseContainer_71eca p-2 rounded-xl"><div style="cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease-out; transform: rotate(90deg);"><svg width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 32 32"><path fill="currentColor" d="M22 16 12 26l-1.4-1.4 8.6-8.6-8.6-8.6L12 6z"></path></svg></div></div></div><div class="transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out" style="overflow: hidden;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-group transition-opacity duration-500 ease-in-out" style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 0px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer"
