<h2 id="global-shortcuts" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Global Shortcuts<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#global-shortcuts">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To create global shortcuts in your <code>main.ts</code> App object insert the property <code>globalShortcuts</code></p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// main.ts</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    globalShortcuts</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Global Shortcut'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>            description</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Global shortcut description'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Received global shortcut'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">Your app cannot have two global shortcuts with the same name</p></div></div>
<h3 id="global-shortcut-context" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Global shortcut context:<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#global-shortcut-context">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">payload</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><a href="#global-shortcut-payload" class="link_3b154 ">GlobalShortcutPayload</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The payload for the global shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">say</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><a href="#say-function" class="link_3b154 ">SayFunction</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Quickly reply to the trigger using the bot. See <a href="#say-function" class="link_3b154 ">SayFunction</a></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">ack</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Callback to acknowledge the trigger. This should be invoked within 3 seconds upon receiving the request. It's recommended for this to be the first call in the trigger handler.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">nack</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">(message?: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Callback to reject the trigger. If provided with an argument the message will be sent to the user as an ephemeral message.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getBotClient</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;ApiClient | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Get the bot ApiClient for the workspace where the trigger was invoked. If you ave set <code>{bot: false}</code> in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">manifest</a> this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getUserClient</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">(userId?: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;ApiClient | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Return the user client given a user id. If userId is not fed in this method it will try to find a the ApiClient of the triggering user. If the user has not authorized your app this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getManifest</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">Manifest</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Return the manifest of your app. This can be used if you need to access some manifest configuration or secret</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getBotUserId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;string | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Get the bot user id for the workspace where the trigger was invoked. If you ave set <code>{bot: false}</code> in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">manifest</a> this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getAuthUrl</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">()=&gt; string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Generate an auth url that when opened it will show the Pumble Consent screen to authorize your app</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The global shortcut payload will contain all the relevant information for the trigger event</p>
<h3 id="global-shortcut-payload" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Global shortcut payload<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#global-shortcut-payload">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">optional</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">shortcut</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The shortcut name that was invoked</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">userId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The user who invoked the shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">channelId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The channel where the shortcut was invoked</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">workspaceId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The workspace where the shortcut was invoked</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="message-shortcuts" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Message Shortcuts<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#message-shortcuts">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To create message shortcuts in your <code>main.ts</code> App object insert the property <code>messageShortcuts</code></p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// main.ts</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    messageShortcuts</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Message Shortcut'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>            description</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Message shortcut description'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Received message shortcut'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">Your app cannot have two message shortcuts with the same name</p></div></div>
<h3 id="message-shortcut-context" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Message shortcut context:<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#message-shortcut-context">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">payload</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><a href="#message-shortcut-payload" class="link_3b154 ">MessageShortcutPayload</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The payload for the global shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">say</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><a href="#reply-function" class="link_3b154 ">ReplyFunction</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Quickly reply to the trigger using the bot. See <a href="#reply-function" class="link_3b154 ">ReplyFunction</a></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">ack</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Callback to acknowledge the trigger. This should be invoked within 3 seconds upon receiving the request. It's recommended for this to be the first call in the trigger handler.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">nack</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">(message?: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Callback to reject the trigger. If provided with an argument the message will be sent to the user as an ephemeral message.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getBotClient</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;ApiClient | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Get the bot ApiClient for the workspace where the trigger was invoked. If you ave set <code>{bot: false}</code> in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">manifest</a> this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getUserClient</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">(userId?: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;ApiClient | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Return the user client given a user id. If userId is not fed in this method it will try to find a the ApiClient of the triggering user. If the user has not authorized your app this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getManifest</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">Manifest</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Return the manifest of your app. This can be used if you need to access some manifest configuration or secret</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getBotUserId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;string | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Get the bot user id for the workspace where the trigger was invoked. If you ave set <code>{bot: false}</code> in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build//manifest.html#payload">manifest</a> this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getAuthUrl</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">()=&gt; string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Generate an auth url that when opened it will show the Pumble Consent screen to authorize your app</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">fetchMessage</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">()=&gt; Promise&lt;Message | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Fetch the message on which the shortcut was invoked. It will first try to fetch the message using the <code>ApiClient</code> of the user that invoked the trigger. If the user has not authorized it will try to fetch with the bot <code>ApiClient</code>. If none of these succeed it will return undefined</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The message shortcut payload will contain all the relevant information for the trigger event</p>
<h3 id="message-shortcut-payload" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Message shortcut payload<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#message-shortcut-payload">#</a></h3>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">optional</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">shortcut</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The shortcut name that was invoked</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">userId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The user who invoked the shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">channelId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The channel where the shortcut was invoked</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">workspaceId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The workspace where the shortcut was invoked</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">messageId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The message id on which  the shortcut was invoked</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="events" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Events<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#events">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To subscribe to events you have to add the listeners in the main <code>App</code>
Events do not need to be acknowledged.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	events</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>			name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"NEW_MESSAGE"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>			</span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">There are two types of events:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><a href="#unauthorize-and-uninstall-events" class="link_3b154 ">App specific events</a> ( <code>APP_UNAUTHORIZED</code> and <code>APP_UNINSTALLED</code> )</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2"><a href="#pumble-events" class="link_3b154 ">Pumble Events</a></li>
</ol>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">While App specific events do not require any special scope to be able to receive them, Pumble Events usually requires the users or bots to have authorized your app with certain scopes to receive them.
So, for example, if you have <code>messages:read</code> scope for the bot but not for users, you will receive only <code>NEW_MESSAGE</code> events that the bot can read.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The list of Pumble Events and their scopes:</p>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">event</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">scopes</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>NEW_MESSAGE</code></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>messages:read</code></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>UPDATED_MESSAGE</code></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>messages:read</code></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>REACTION_ADDED</code></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>reaction:read</code></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>CHANNEL_CREATED</code></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>channels:read</code></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>WORKSPACE_USER_JOINED</code></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"><code>user:read</code></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 id="unauthorize-and-uninstall-events" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Unauthorize and Uninstall events<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#unauthorize-and-uninstall-events">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">These events will be useful to cleanup the tokens in the token store, and do any other cleanup after user un-authorizes</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	events</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>			name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"APP_UNAUTHORIZED"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>			</span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"UNAUTHORIZED USER"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>payload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>workspaceUser</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<h3 id="pumble-events" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Pumble Events<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#pumble-events">#</a></h3>
<h4 id="pumble-events-context" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154">Pumble Events Context<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#pumble-events-context">#</a></h4>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">payload</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">[EventPayload#event-payload)</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The payload for the global shortcut</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getBotClient</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;ApiClient | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Get the bot ApiClient for the workspace where the trigger was invoked. If you ave set <code>{bot: false}</code> in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">manifest</a> this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getUserClient</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">(userId: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;ApiClient | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">An event that arrives in your app can apply to more than one user. Therefore <code>getUserClient</code> the event is not user specific so <code>userId</code> must be provided. An exception for this rule applies to <code>NEW_MESSAGE</code>, <code>UPDATED_MESSAGE</code> and <code>REACTION_ADDED</code> event. The default user id in <code>getUserClient</code> for these events is the message/reaction author</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getManifest</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">Manifest</a></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Return the manifest of your app. This can be used if you need to access some manifest configuration or secret</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider"></td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getBotUserId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">() =&gt; Promise&lt;string | undefined&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Get the bot user id for the workspace where the trigger was invoked. If you ave set <code>{bot: false}</code> in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html#payload">manifest</a> this will return undefined</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">getAuthUrl</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">()=&gt; string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Generate an auth url that when opened it will show the Pumble Consent screen to authorize your app</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4 id="new_message-event-context" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154"><code>NEW_MESSAGE</code> Event Context<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#new_message-event-context">#</a></h4>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>NEW_MESSAGE</code> Event context in addition to the normal events context has the <code>say</code> function. See <a href="#reply-function" class="link_3b154 ">Reply Function</a></p>
<h4 id="reaction_added-event-context" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154"><code>REACTION_ADDED</code> Event Context<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#reaction_added-event-context">#</a></h4>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>REACTION_ADDED</code> Event context in addition to the normal events context has <code>fetchMessage</code> function.
This function will first try to find the <code>ApiClient</code> of the reaction author. If that is not successful it will fall back the the bot <code>ApiClient</code> and will try to fetch the message where the reaction was added.</p>
<h4 id="event-payload" class="mt-8 leading-6 text-lg title_3b154">Event Payload<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#event-payload">#</a></h4>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">body</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">object</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Event specific body</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">eventType</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Type of the event</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">workspaceId</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Workspace id where the event happened</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">workspaceUserIds</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Array&lt;string&gt;</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The list of users that have authorized the app with the required event scopes, and they have access to the event (bot can be included in this list)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="say-function" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Say function<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#say-function">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Say function will use your app's bot to respond to a trigger.
By default it will send an <code>ephemeral</code> message to the triggering user.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>message</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>text</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">string</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> blocks</span><span class="token operator">?</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> Block</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> attachments</span><span class="token operator">?</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> Attachment</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> type</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"in_channel"</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">|</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"ephemeral"</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"ephemeral"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span class="token operator">...</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 <h2 id="reply-function" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Reply function<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#reply-function">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Reply function is similar to <a href="#say-function" class="link_3b154 ">Say Function</a>, but it has one more extra parameter <code>reply</code>.
This function applies only to contexts where a message or message id is present.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Message"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"in_channel"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">If it's set to true, the response will be posted as a reply to the original message. If the original message is in a thread, me response will be posted in the same thread.</p></div><div class="rspress-doc-footer"><footer class="mt-8"><div class="xs:flex pb-5 px-2 justify-end items-center"></div><div class="flex flex-col"></div><div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:justify-around gap-4 pt-6"><div class="prev_e7091 flex flex-col"><a class="link_03735 pager-link_9b9a7 class="title_9b9a7">Interactive Elements</span></a></div></div></footer></div></div></div><button class="scroll-to-top_1a167 "><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" <h3 id="cakecom-developer-privacy-policy" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">CAKE.COM DEVELOPER PRIVACY POLICY<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#cakecom-developer-privacy-policy">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><em><strong class="font-semibold">Last Updated</strong></em>: 21/02/2023</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This Privacy Policy explains how CAKE.com Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliates (“<em><strong class="font-semibold">CAKE.com</strong></em>,” “<em><strong class="font-semibold">we</strong></em>,” or “<em><strong class="font-semibold">us</strong></em>”) collect, use, and di
